name: Zombie Fall Monster Drop (an emoji gravity game)
name_original: Zombie Fall Monster Drop (an emoji gravity game)
description:
An addictive single tap game. Just tap on the screen to tilt platforms and make the zombie emoji drop smoothly from one wood plank to the next. Collect monster coins to use in the shop and unlock more emoji's.

- Super simple dumb proof controls that kids and adults can play.
- Unlock new smiley emoji's with your monster coins.
- This game dont need wifi to play.

Now have some monster fun :)
